alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Buchanan; Clay; Clinton; DeKalb; Gentry; Nodaway; Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 10:28AM CDT until July 29 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Doniphan County in northeastern Kansas... North central Leavenworth County in northeastern Kansas... Eastern Atchison County in northeastern Kansas... Buchanan County in northwestern Missouri... Clinton County in northwestern Missouri... Clay County in west central Missouri... Gentry County in northwestern Missouri... Southeastern Nodaway County in northwestern Missouri... Platte County in west central Missouri... Eastern Andrew County in northwestern Missouri... DeKalb County in northwestern Missouri... * Until 1115 AM CDT. * At 1028 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Maryville to 6 miles southwest of Union Star to near Lewis And Clark Village, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kansas City, St. Joseph, Leavenworth, Liberty, Excelsior Springs, Atchison, Cameron, Smithville, Kearney, Platte City, Lawson, Plattsburg, Lathrop, Albany, Weston, Gower, Wathena, Elwood, Stanberry and Maysville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 15 and 56. Interstate 29 between mile markers 12 and 56. Interstate 435 between mile markers 29 and 49. Interstate 229 between mile markers 0 and 13. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Andrew; Buchanan; Clay; Clinton; DeKalb; Gentry; Nodaway; Platte
